column1: '''Ketchup Games''' was the company that published the trilogy [[Mines of Moria (video game series)|Mines of Moria]].<ref>[http://www.lysator.liu.se/tolkien-games/entry/mom-trilogy.html Mines of Moria] at Tolkien Games (retrieved 17 April 2011)</ref><ref>[http://www.meristation.com/v3/des_articulo.php?pic=GEN&id=2254&idj=&idp=&tipo=art&c=1&pos=9 Meristation
